item.title: Jelly Troops launches September 18
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Switch

Playable at BitSummit the 13th.

“Lightning-fast pick-up-and-play real-time strategy game” Jelly Troops will launch for Switch and PC via Steam on September 18, publisher Phoenixx and developer Nukenin announced.

The game will also be playable at BitSummit the 13th, which will run from July 18 to 20 at Miyako Messe in Kyoto, Japan.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

An online action real-time strategy game where the tide can turn in a flash!

Fight exciting battles where you recruit golems to battle your opponent’s slimes, cleverly redirect their slimes with walls, or sneakily steal their flag to make a dramatic comeback.

Easy to Play, Hard to Master

Unlike traditional real-time strategy games, Jelly Troops doesn’t have complex units or resource management, so anyone can pick it up and play. Every battle is different. Should you get more slimes, capture the flag, or send your guardians to punish your opponent? It’s up to you!

Key Features

  • An easy real-time strategy game that anyone can play.
  • Fast-paced action.
  • Sneaky capture-the-flag gameplay.
  • Cute visuals and animations.
  • Quick matches.
  • Highly replayable.
  • Play against your friends or match with random players anywhere in the world.
  • Split-screen two-player battles.

item.title: Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar ‘Gameplay Overview’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Switch
  • Switch 2

A five-minute introduction.

Marvelous has released a five-minute gameplay overview trailer for Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar.

Here is an overview of the game, via Marvelous:

About

Tired of the hustle and bustle of the city, and looking for a life of cozy comforts? Have a green thumb, a love for animals, and a desire for a breath of fresh mountain air? Consider making Zephyr Town your new home!

Our delightful location offers invigorating year-round winds and boasts a world-famous market…which admittedly has fallen on hard times. We’re looking for a motivated individual to help us bring brighter days back to our breezy burg! We’ll even provide you with a farm to help bring local goods to wanting customers and show the world that Zephyr Town’s bazaar can still fly high.

Please contact Mayor Felix to make an appointment to visit today! Serious inquiries only.

Zephyr Town’s bazaar was once one of the grandest in the world, drawing customers and peddlers from all four corners of the globe. These days, though, the bazaar has more tumbleweeds than customers. It’s up to you to turn its fortunes around! Raise animals, harvest crops, craft rare delicacies, then sell your wares at your very own stall in the bazaar. As the bazaar business grows, new goods and services will arrive, which you can use to improve your farm. Help return prosperity to the bazaar, and Zephyr Town will thrive once again!

Inspired by the classic handheld title, the new Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar builds up and improves on the original in every conceivable way. The world is bigger and more alive than ever thanks to incredible new visuals, new characters, expanded story, and full character voice work in story events—a series first. Take advantage of Zephyr Town’s unique weather, using the wind to make travel and farm tasks a breeze! The winds of change are coming to deliver your new life in Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar.

Key Features

  • Cozy Living Reaches New Heights – The magnificent beauty of Zephyr Town shines with gorgeous graphics while a richly voiced story carries the player on a rewarding journey of farming, friendship, and renewal.
  • Ring the Bell and Sell, Sell, Sell – Your farm’s produce and goods take on additional importance as the heart of your business at the lively weekly bazaar. Customize your stall and take charge of your sales to build up buzz and power up profits.
  • Take the Leap – Harness the power of the wind! Use windmills to create new products to sell, and effortlessly travel across the town on your glider. Use new jumping skills on your farm, or when exploring the town. You never know what you’ll find!
  • A Beautifully Cozy Life – Enjoy a rich life amongst a colorful community of characters, from friendly townsfolk to magical Nature Sprites. Build yourself a home, grow relationships, and even find love and start a family.

Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar is due out for Switch 2, Switch, and PC via Steam on August 27 worldwide.

item.title: FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time sales top 1.2 million; Switch 2 physical edition launches August 7 in Japan
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Photo Mode update due out in July.

Total sales for slow-life RPG FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time have surpassed 1.2 million units, publisher LEVEL-5 and developer LEVEL-5 Osaka announced.

Additionally, LEVEL-5 announced plans to release a physical edition of the Switch 2 version on August 7 in Japan. It will ship as a “Nintendo Switch 2 Edition,” similar to games like Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma. Physical editions are currently available for PlayStation 5 and Switch.

FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam on May 21 worldwide, followed by Switch 2 on June 5. It sold 500,000 copies within its first two days of release, 800,000 copies within 10 days, and one million copies by June 12.

A “Photo Mode” is scheduled to be implemented via an update later in July. Players will be able to take photo using features such as pose settings, the option to show or hide Buddies and adjustable camera angles to suit each player’s preferences. A photo contest is also planned, with details to be announced in the near future.
